core.interfaces.dashboard module

Dashboard generation interface.

class core.interfaces.dashboard.DashboardGenerator[source]

Bases: ABC

Dashboard generation interface.

This abstract base class defines the interface for generating interactive dashboards from simulation logs. Implementations should generate HTML dashboards that can be viewed in a web browser.

abstractmethod generate(log: SimulationLog, output_path: Path, osm_path: Path | None = None) → None[source]

Generate interactive dashboard from simulation log.

Parameters:

  • log – Simulation log containing trajectory and metadata

  • output_path – Path where the generated HTML dashboard will be saved

  • osm_path – Optional path to OSM map file for map visualization

Raises:

  • FileNotFoundError – If template or required files are not found

  • ValueError – If log data is invalid or incomplete

core.interfaces.simulator module

Simulator interface for autonomous driving simulation.

class core.interfaces.simulator.Simulator[source]

Bases: ABC

シミュレータの抽象基底クラス.

abstractmethod reset() → VehicleState[source]

シミュレーションをリセット.

Returns:

初期車両状態

Return type:

VehicleState

abstractmethod step(action: Action) → tuple[VehicleState, bool, dict[str, Any]][source]

シミュレーションを1ステップ進める.

Parameters:

action – 実行するアクション

Returns:

  • next_state: 次の車両状態

  • done: エピソード終了フラグ

  • info: 追加情報

Return type:

tuple[VehicleState, bool, dict[str, Any]]

abstractmethod run(planner: Planner, controller: Controller, max_steps: int = 1000, reference_trajectory: Trajectory | None = None) → SimulationResult[source]

シミュレーションを実行.

Parameters:

  • planner – プランナー

  • controller – コントローラー

  • max_steps – 最大ステップ数

  • reference_trajectory – 参照軌道（ゴール判定用）

Returns:

シミュレーション結果

Return type:

SimulationResult

abstractmethod close() → None[source]

シミュレータを終了.

abstractmethod get_log() → SimulationLog[source]

シミュレーションログを取得.

Returns:

シミュレーションログ

Return type:

SimulationLog

class core.interfaces.DashboardGenerator[source]

Bases: ABC

Dashboard generation interface.

This abstract base class defines the interface for generating interactive dashboards from simulation logs. Implementations should generate HTML dashboards that can be viewed in a web browser.

abstractmethod generate(log: SimulationLog, output_path: Path, osm_path: Path | None = None) → None[source]

Generate interactive dashboard from simulation log.

Parameters:

  • log – Simulation log containing trajectory and metadata

  • output_path – Path where the generated HTML dashboard will be saved

  • osm_path – Optional path to OSM map file for map visualization

Raises:

  • FileNotFoundError – If template or required files are not found

  • ValueError – If log data is invalid or incomplete
